title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Linda Yaccarino steps down after a turbulent two years leading X

items.title: X CEO Linda Yaccarino Says She Is Leaving Elon Musk’s Platform
items.description: Linda Yaccarino, whom Elon Musk hired to run X in 2023, grappled with the challenges the company faced after Mr. Musk took over.

items.title: As the Texas Floodwaters Rose, One Indispensable Voice Was Silent
items.description: The National Weather Service put out good forecasts. But a vital employee was missing.

items.title: After Iran's war with Israel, questions return about Khamenei's potential successors
items.description: After the 12-day war in June, the issue of who will succeed Iran's longtime supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has become more urgent.

items.title: French Police Raid National Rally Over Campaign Finances
items.description: The authorities said they were investigating whether the nationalist, anti-immigrant party broke France’s campaign-finance rules.

items.description: Warnings about withdrawal from antidepressants have rippled through society in recent years. A new study claims they are overblown.

items.description: Researchers in the NOAA program were furloughed because funds to pay them were not available.

items.title: A Dark-of-Night Flood Escape at the River Inn in Texas
items.description: Along the Guadalupe River, a 60-room inn and nearby homes were quickly filling with water. Confusion, desperation and heroism ensued.
